summary: Batch 12: Anti-cheat system, server-side trivia validation, USDT support, and progressive difficulty — ALL TESTS PASSED. 18 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend UI checks passed.
passed_tests: Backend: Step claim rate limit (5min cooldown) blocks second immediate claim with 429 - PASSED
Backend: Step claim rejects < 10 steps with 400 - PASSED
Backend: Step claim rejects > 50000 steps with 400 - PASSED
Backend: Step claim accepts valid range (10-50000) - PASSED
Backend: Step claim returns daily_zwap_remaining field - PASSED
Backend: Game result rate limit (20s cooldown) blocks rapid submissions with 429 - PASSED
Backend: zBrickles rejects impossible score > 5000 with 400 - PASSED
Backend: zTrivia rejects impossible score > 50 with 400 - PASSED
Backend: zTetris/zSlots impossible scores handled (403 for starter tier) - PASSED
Backend: Game result returns daily_zwap_remaining and daily_zpts_remaining - PASSED
Backend: GET /api/games/trivia/questions returns session_id and education spine questions - PASSED
Backend: Trivia questions have module names (What Is Cryptocurrency?, etc.) - PASSED
Backend: POST /api/games/trivia/answer validates server-side, returns correct/time_bonus - PASSED
Backend: Trivia wrong answer returns correct=false with correct_answer - PASSED
Backend: GET /api/swap/prices includes USDT at 1.00 - PASSED
Backend: API health check - PASSED
Backend: Tiers endpoint available - PASSED
Frontend: Splash screen loads with MOVE. PLAY. SWAP. animation - PASSED
Frontend: Dashboard loads with wallet connected (100 ZWAP, 0 zPts) - PASSED
Frontend: Play tab shows 4 games (zBrickles, zTrivia, zTetris, zSlots) - PASSED
Frontend: zTetris and zSlots show lock icon and Plus badge for starter tier - PASSED
Frontend: zTrivia loads education spine questions from backend - PASSED
Frontend: zTrivia shows module name above question (What Is ZWAP?, What Is a Swap?) - PASSED
Frontend: Trivia answer shows red feedback for wrong answer, highlights correct - PASSED
Frontend: SwapTab shows USDT as token option with Tether logo - PASSED
Frontend: SwapTab token dropdown shows MATIC, USDC, USDT, WETH - PASSED
Frontend: Progressive difficulty — baseLevel calculated from games_played/3 + 1 - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Anti-cheat rate limiting: In-memory rate limiter (_rate_limits defaultdict) tracks per-wallet cooldowns. STEP_CLAIM_COOLDOWN=300s, GAME_RESULT_COOLDOWN=20s implemented correctly.
Sanity checks: MIN_STEPS_PER_CLAIM=10, MAX_STEPS_PER_CLAIM=50000, MAX_GAME_SCORES dict with zbrickles:5000, ztrivia:50, ztetris:10000, zslots:8000 — all enforced.
Daily ZWAP caps: DAILY_ZWAP_CAPS={starter:500, plus:1500} with check_and_reset_daily_zwap() function resetting at midnight UTC.
Education spine trivia: 18 questions from 6 modules (Cryptocurrency, Blockchain, Wallet, ZWAP, zPts, Swap) — server-side validated via EDUCATION_TRIVIA constant.
Trivia sessions: _trivia_sessions dict stores session_id→answers with 10min expiry. POST /api/games/trivia/answer validates against original question answer.
USDT: Added to get_crypto_prices() return dict with value 1.00. Frontend SwapTab TOKENS includes USDT with Tether logo.
Progressive difficulty: PlayTab baseLevel = Math.min(Math.floor(gamesPlayed/3) + 1, 10) scales game level with experience.
CoinzillaAd scaffolding: Component at /app/frontend/src/components/ads/CoinzillaAd.jsx with banner/leaderboard/rectangle sizes. No live zone IDs configured (MOCKED).

mocked_apis_list: CoinzillaAd component is scaffolding only — no live ad zone IDs configured

context_for_next_testing_agent: Batch 12 anti-cheat features fully tested. Rate limits are in-memory per wallet (steps: 5min, games: 20s). Sanity checks enforce step count 10-50000 and game score maximums. Daily ZWAP caps (starter:500, plus:1500) reset at midnight UTC. Education spine trivia with 18 questions validates server-side. USDT at 1.00 in swap prices. Progressive difficulty scales level with games_played. CoinzillaAd is scaffolding only.
